{"id":528763546,"lang":"cpp","time":"8 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1627332116,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/528763546/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"5.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double myPow(double x, int n) {\n        double ans = 1.0;\n        int temp = n;\n        if(n == INT_MIN)\n        {\n            n = n + 1;\n            n = -1 * n;\n            ans = ans / x;\n        }\n        if(n < 0)\n            n = -1 * n;\n        while(n != 0)\n        {\n            if(n % 2 == 0)\n            {\n                x *= x;\n                n /= 2;\n            }\n            else\n            {\n                ans = ans * x;\n                n -= 1;\n            }\n        }\n        if(temp < 0)\n            return 1.0 / ans;\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n"}
